intro: Triphasia brassii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white, which bloom throughout the year under proper care. Triphasia brassii is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
